comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: Santiam River Bridge This bridge no longer exists! It was located on 99E, where Interstate 5 currently crosses the Santiam River just northwest of Jackson, Oregon. According to Bridge Hunters, it was built in 1946, and replaced in 1991. Follow the link for more details. Now, by @tiffs: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/32761263@N00/2610886979/]
